Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
Transaction
public class Transaction extends Object
The Transaction class represents a transaction in a vending machine. It keeps track of the items sold, total cost, total calories, total payment, and total change of the transaction.

  • Method Details

    • addTransaction

      public void addTransaction(ItemSlot itemSlot, float payment)
      Add a new item slot to the transaction and update the transaction's attributes based on the added item. This method is used to record the sale of an item in the transaction.
      Parameters:
      itemSlot - The item slot representing the item sold in the transaction.
      payment - The payment made by the customer for the item.

    • getItemsSold

      public ArrayList<ItemSlot> getItemsSold()
      Get the list of item slots representing the items sold in the transaction.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of ItemSlot objects representing the items sold in the transaction.

    • getTotalCost

      public float getTotalCost()
      Get the total cost of all items sold in the transaction.
      Returns:
      The total cost of all items sold in the transaction.

    • getTotalCalories

      public float getTotalCalories()
      Get the total calories of all items sold in the transaction.
      Returns:
      The total calories of all items sold in the transaction.

    • getTotalPayment

      public float getTotalPayment()
      Get the total payment received for the items in the transaction.
      Returns:
      The total payment received for the items in the transaction.

    • getTotalChange

      public float getTotalChange()
      Get the total change given to the customer in the transaction.
      Returns:
      The total change given to the customer in the transaction.
